pca_viz

Modules for plotting PCA results from MPT data

plot_pca(pca_embeddings_df, target_column[, ...])

myplot(score, coeff[, labels, targets, ...])

examples to run this: fig = plt.figure(figsize=(12,8)) myplot(pca_embeddings[:,0:2],np.transpose(pca.components_[0:2, :]), labels=col_names, targets=labels, num_points=2500) plt.title('Bi-plot of First and Second Principal Components of Age Dataset')
